meanings.definition: The action of supervising or overseeing a person or group.
meanings.sent1: During the supervisions, the teacher watched over the students.
meanings.sent2: The supervisions of the construction site were crucial for safety.
meanings.sent3: The supervisions at the zoo made sure the monkeys didn't escape.
meanings.sent4: Her supervisions were like a protective shield around the team.
meanings.sent5: The supervisions were like a guiding light in the dark.

meanings.definition: The process of directing and controlling a project or activity.
meanings.sent1: Effective supervisions ensure the project stays on track.
meanings.sent2: The supervisions of the event were meticulous and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The supervisions of the baking contest kept the cakes from burning.
meanings.sent4: His supervisions were the engine driving the success of the business.
meanings.sent5: The supervisions were the map guiding us through the project.

meanings.definition: The act of monitoring and guiding the work of others.
meanings.sent1: Her supervisions improved the quality of the team's work.
meanings.sent2: The supervisions of the employees were fair and supportive.
meanings.sent3: The supervisions of the gardeners made sure the flowers bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent4: His supervisions were like a steady hand on the team's shoulder.
meanings.sent5: The supervisions were the compass pointing the team in the right direction.
